Instinctive Dodge.display: You dodge about, making yourself harder to hit.
Instinctive Dodge.help:
Attempt to dodge.
Reduces enemy accuracy by 5.

Instinctive Deflect.display: You ready yourself and deflect the first attack.

Instinctive Brace.display: You brace yourself, blocking the incoming blows.
Instinctive Brace.help:
Attempt to brace against the damage.
Reduces enemy damage per hit by 5.
